attributes.action: Dispose of the sexual offenders registry and replace it with a criminal registry that is more discerning and based on violence and danger to the public.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The SOR is now ineffective due to all manner of minor incidents being included as a registration trigger. This register should be kept for the most dangerous in our society and should not be a catch all affair as it currently is. Only violent and repeat offenders should be on it and for all crimes not just sexual offences.
